summary:
Mermaid all bodyslide .This is a fish outfit.
Contains CBBE and UUNP HDT BodySlide
descriptionHtml:
[b]Photo by  [url=http://mearalikesmead.tumblr.com/post/173870473079]mearalikesmead[/url]   and  [url=https://coco2048.tumblr.com/]COCO [/url][url=https://coco2048.tumblr.com/]2048[/url]

[/b]Thank you for your beautiful screenshot!

I will cheer for the screenshot you posted! :)
[b]
[[b]Content[/b]][/b] [list]
[list]
[*]The preview shows the correct armor reference.
[*]Includes hairpiece .
[*]Contains [i]CBBE and [/i] [i]UUNP[/i] [i]HDT BodySlide[/i]
[/list][/list]
[b]Please use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905]AddItemMenu[/url] to get the props. ﻿[/b]
It can also be forging.
[b]Before you wear it, you have to convert it by bodyslide .[/b]
Update fomod Installation . If you fail to install fomod,
please uncompress and select the appropriate installation. 
[b]
[[b]Necessary plug-in[/b]][/b] 
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended V3.0+[/url]﻿ 
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physics Extension[/url]﻿﻿ 
[*][i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide[/url]﻿[/i]
[/list]
Although it's not my own account, it's actually made and uploaded by me.
Thank you for your support.I'm sorry for my carelessness.
If you have any questions, please contact me.
Myemail：[i]xxcsex @ gmail.com  [/i]
author: coco2048
